feedback.fit: The flowy blouse and flared skirt create a feminine, bohemian silhouette that suits her frame well.
feedback.color: The pastel floral print coordinates nicely with the teal sandals for a soft, spring-appropriate color palette.
feedback.footwear: The teal wedges add a pop of color and elongate her legs, but a more neutral sandal could also work.
feedback.accessories: The straw fedora complements the bohemian vibe and provides sun protection.
feedback.style: Overall, this is a cute, well-coordinated outfit for a casual summer day. Embraces the bohemian aesthetic.

feedback.fit: The oversized denim jacket and loose shorts create a relaxed, boyish silhouette. Could benefit from more shape.
feedback.color: The blue denim and yellow shorts are a classic casual combo. Neutral shoes keep it understated.
feedback.footwear: The lace-up espadrille wedges suit the laid-back outfit and add a touch of femininity.
feedback.accessories: The outfit could be elevated with the addition of a couple simple accessories, like a pendant necklace or bracelet.
feedback.style: Has an effortless tomboy vibe that's ideal for a low-key summer day. A few small tweaks could polish the look.

feedback.fit: The cropped jacket and short skirt show off her legs and create a slim, leggy silhouette that flatters her figure.
feedback.color: The blue denim jacket pops against the black skirt and is punctuated by her red sunglasses for a bold look.
feedback.footwear: The strappy black heels elongate her legs and add a feminine edge. Coordinates well with the black skirt.
feedback.accessories: The red sunglasses and black hat add interest to the outfit and give it a cool, downtown vibe.
feedback.style: Balances feminine and edgy elements for a flirty yet confident look. Very stylish and intentional.

feedback.fit: The oversized tee and loose shorts create a very casual, boxy silhouette. A more fitted top could improve the proportions.
feedback.color: The blue tie-dye pairs fine with the denim shorts. Mostly muted, neutral tones.
feedback.footwear: The nude heels seem a bit disconnected from the very casual outfit. A flat sandal may coordinate better.
feedback.accessories: The red belt adds a nice pop of color at the waist. Could also incorporate a long pendant necklace.
feedback.style: Has potential but feels a bit disjointed between the casual separates and glam heels. A few swaps could make it more cohesive.

feedback.fit: The sleeveless hoodie and cuffed shorts create a relaxed, sporty silhouette. Comfortable yet stylish.
feedback.color: The bright blue top adds a nice pop of color to the grey shorts. Black booties ground the look.
feedback.footwear: The black ankle booties toughen up the sporty outfit while still being comfortable for walking around.
feedback.accessories: The outfit is simple and streamlined, but could add a long pendant necklace or stack of bracelets if desired.
feedback.style: Achieves an effortlessly cool, sporty vibe. Practical for a casual summer day while still being on-trend.

feedback.fit: The flowy blouse and shorts create an ethereal, romantic silhouette. Very feminine and flattering for her figure.
feedback.color: The peach floral print is soft and pretty, perfect for summer. Pops of teal in the shoes add freshness.
feedback.footwear: The teal ankle strap flats complement the floral print beautifully and look comfortable for walking.
feedback.accessories: No major accessories are needed, as the floral print makes a statement on its own. Very cohesive.
feedback.style: Nails the romantic bohemian aesthetic. The flowy silhouette and floral print are flirty and free-spirited.

feedback.fit: The sundress has a relaxed, flowy fit that's perfect for a casual summer day. Flatters her shape nicely.
feedback.color: The orange polka dot print is fun and playful. Neutral accessories keep the focus on the dress.
feedback.footwear: The nude wedges elongate her legs and dress up the casual sundress a bit. A flat sandal could also work.
feedback.accessories: The brown leather belt defines her waist and breaks up the print. Simple and effective.
feedback.style: This is a quintessential cute summer sundress look. Casual and comfortable but still stylish and feminine.

feedback.fit: The chambray top has a slightly oversized fit, as do the cuffed denim shorts. A more fitted top could balance the proportions better.
feedback.color: The light and medium blue denim create a casual double denim look. The tan accessories coordinate but don't add much contrast.
feedback.footwear: The nude heels are a bit dressy for the casual outfit. A flat sandal or sneaker would suit the aesthetic more.
feedback.accessories: The braided belt adds some interest at the waist. Could also cuff the sleeves and add a couple of simple bracelets.
feedback.style: Achieves an easy, casual vibe but the oversized proportions and dressy shoes hold it back from being a knockout look.

feedback.fit: The sleeveless romper shows off her arms and legs, creating a slim, leggy silhouette. Very flattering for her figure.
feedback.color: The light blue chambray is fresh and summery. The brown and gold accessories add rich, warm accents.
feedback.footwear: The brown gladiator sandals complement the belt and bangle. Comfortable and stylish for summer.
feedback.accessories: The brown leather belt defines her waist and the gold bangle adds a touch of shine. Well-coordinated extras.
feedback.style: This romper look is casual chic perfection. Easy to wear but still polished thanks to the accessories.

feedback.fit: The graphic tee and denim shorts both have a loose, slightly boxy fit. Tucking in the tee a bit could improve the silhouette.
feedback.color: The black tee and blue denim shorts are a classic casual combo. The tan bag adds a neutral accent.
feedback.footwear: The black strappy sandals work with the tee and are practical for walking around in the summer.
feedback.accessories: The outfit is quite simple, so a long pendant necklace and a couple of bracelets could elevate the look.
feedback.style: Has an edgy rocker vibe that suits her style. A few small tweaks in fit and accessories could take it to the next level.
